titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Poll Book (Luzerne County, Pa.) 1864-1864
titlestmt.subtitle: Poll Book (Luzerne County, Pa.) Mss. Acc. 2009.382

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created by Ute Schechter, 2009

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Poll Book (Luzerne County, Pa.), 1864-1864 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center Mss. Acc. 2009.382
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2012 &contact;
Processed By
Special Collections Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Poll book, 11 October, 1864, for Civil War soldiers from Luzerne County, Pennsylvania at the headquarters of the 58th Regiment (Pennsylvania) while stationed at Chaffin's Farms, Virginia. Includes list of soldiers voting, and names and signatures of those appointed clerks and judges. Also includes voting results for national and local elections.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Pool Book (Luzerne County, Pa.), Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 09/08/2009.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and described in September 2009 by Ute Schechter.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Luzerne County (Pa.).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Poll book, 11 October, 1864, for Civil War soldiers from Luzerne County, Pennsylvania at the headquarters of the 58th Regiment (Pennsylvania) while stationed at Chaffin's Farms, Virginia. Includes list of soldiers voting, and names and signatures of those appointed clerks and judges. Also includes voting results for national and local elections.

controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
